Title: Your Training Starts Now
Description:
<Xiao does not look up from his bowl.>

Hey, new $g guy: lady;! Glad to see you survived the banquet! Trial One: Complete!

<Xiao eats noisily.>

You'd better speak up with Instructor Xann. He'll be expecting you for your daily exercises.

<He continues eating. You suspect that he is done talking to you.>
ObjectivesText: Report to Instructor Xann at the Tian Monastery in the Jade Forest.
RewardText:
First, you drink too much beer... and then you show up to class late? Looks like you've already conformed to pandaren culture.

Let's begin.
